name: crm-monorepo
description: Full-featured CRM monorepo (Express API + Next.js Web)

scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:api -- --fix && npm run lint:web -- --fix
scripts.format: npm --prefix apps/api run format && npm --prefix apps/web run format
scripts.format:check: npm --prefix apps/api run format:check && npm --prefix apps/web run format:check
scripts.db:test:up: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d db_test
scripts.db:test:down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v db_test
